alert.note: Alert for Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 5:42PM EST until January 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... South Fork Kentucky River at Booneville affecting Owsley County. Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. For the Kentucky River...including Whitesburg, Hazard, Jackson, Oneida, Booneville, Heidelberg, Ravenna...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Heidelberg. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 PM EST Saturday the stage was 19.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 24.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 5 AM.
